nodes.text: Lord Council was a title held by the leader of the Kadrillian species. In the year 1 ABY, during the invasion of the Kadrillian homeworld, a Kadrillian named Lon Prador held the title.
The title of Lord Council was first used in Planet of Kadril, a comic strip published in 1980 by the Los Angeles Times Syndicate and written by Archie Goodwin under the name Russ Helm.
